547030.name: Terminal Hacker - Payload
547030.description:
Terminal Hacker - Payload Adds a special in game icon to show your support for Terminal Hacker and provides some help for you struggling hackers.

  • Special in game icon
  • + 3 Starting bypasses in all gamemodes
  • + 3 Starting guesses in marathon gamemode
  • + 10 Seconds in classic gamemode

Note: The bypasses are permanent, if you own Payload you will get +3 bypasses in all gamemodes, + 3 guesses in marathon, and + 10 starting time in classic gamemode per run permanently. The dlc features can be disabled/re-enabled in the options menu.

Happy hacking.
547030.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
